title: Satrumun Lyrics Madha Gaja Raja Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer - Santosh Hariharan
Music - Vijay Antony
Lyrics - Annamalai
Movie - Madha Gaja Raja		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Satrumun varai ennil irundhaen
unnai kandadhum eppadi thozhaindhaen
Otrai nodiyile uzhagai marandhaen oh ho oh..

Unnai paarthadhum thookam marandhaen
kadhal vandhadhum kaatril midhandhaen
nee illaamal naan eppadi irupen oh ho oh..

Unvizhi chaaral mazhayile
jaladhosam idikudhey
nee irundhaal en arugiley
ennakedho nadakudhey oh vuho ..huvoho..

Satrumun varai ennil irundhaen
unnai kandadhum eppadi thozhaindhaen
Otrai nodiyile uzhagai marandhaen oh ho oh..

Yaaro poley aanen naaney
enmel kadhal kavila
vaanam pogum dhooram poley
unmel aasai viriya
iravil un ninaivil
en urakkam kettu thozhaiya
kanavil en arugil
haiyo vandhu kollaadhey..oh vuho ..huvoho..

Satrumun varai ennil irundhaen
unnai kandadhum eppadi thozhaindhaen
Otrai nodiyile uzhagai marandhaen oh ho oh..

Nee ennai paarthaal podhum podhum
enmel pookkal sidharum o ho..
nee or vaarthai sonnaal podhum
theeyai theendumm viralum o oh..

unnaal thaagam vellam poley
enmel pongi valiya
neeyum ayyyo paarvai paarthaai
ennul theeyaai aeriya Â oh vuho ..huvoho..

Satrumun varai ennil irundhaen
unnai kandadhum eppadi thozhaindhaen
Otrai nodiyile uzhagai marandhaen oh ho oh..

Unvizhi chaaral mazhayile
jaladhosam idikudhey
nee irundhaal en arugiley
ennakedho nadakudhey oh vuho ..huvoho..
